root.description: The trap door opens silently. The room is bright and warm, but eerie.
root.hint: Geralt: "Only one way to deal with a witch."

exit.description: A wooden #ladder^ climbs down through a trap door in the floor.

prop.description: Fumes and flames erupt from a bubbling #cauldron^.
prop.onCheck: Teeming with energy, it shakes and rattles at the witch's words.
